title: [Health] Plastics are useful but can pose a significant challenge to environment and may also constitute a health concern. Exposure to plastic-associated chemicals can increase the risk of human cardiovascular disease. Now a new groundbreaking study links high cholesterol, cardiovascular disease to plastics.

[Health] The widespread perception that e-cigarettes are less harmful than cigarettes might have contributed to its increased uptakeâ€”particularly among youth. and among smokers and nonsmokers alike. But now a new study finds that e-cigarettes use may be associated with erectile dysfunction (ED).
